user_query: I'm a sports journalist and I'm writing an article about the Women's World Cup 2023. Can you provide me with some interesting facts about the tournament? I would like to know the total number of countries participating and any notable players to watch out for.

TaskList.description: Gather information about the total number of countries participating in the Women's World Cup 2023.
Collect data on notable players to watch for in the Women's World Cup 2023.
Compile the gathered information into a formatted report.
